price: Они, уместо Аллаха, узимају лажна божанства тражећи од њих помоћ и славу.
arabic: وَٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةٗ لِّيَكُونُواْ لَهُمۡ عِزّٗا

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-ittakhadhū min dūni al-lahi ālihatan liyakūnū lahum ʿizzan
